thread.title: Nanny Convicted of Murdering Two in Her Care Gets Life Sentence

author: Corinne Ramey
title: Nanny Convicted of Murdering Two in Her Care Gets Life Sentence
text:
The former New York City nanny convicted of murder for fatally stabbing two children in her care was sentenced Monday to life in prison without parole.
After a six-week trial, a Manhattan jury last month convicted Yoselyn Ortega, 56 years old, of two counts of first-degree murder and two counts of second-degree murder for killing 6-year-old Lucia “Lulu” Krim and her 2-year-old brother Leo.
On...
